Detailed Description

Main routine implementation.

This procedure proccess command-line arguments (if any) and calls the serial routine with the correct device filename string.

Author:
Rodrigo Tobar <rtobar@csrg.inf.utfsm.cl>

Function Documentation

int main ( int  args,
char *  argv[] 
)

Main routine.

Starts the serial port, passing it the device file received as argument or the default serial port device file defined as DEFAULT_PORT.

Parameters:
args number of command-line arguments passed.
argv command-line arguments values.
Returns:
Always zero (0). However, a normal termination is caused by a SIGINT signal handled by the listener routine's implementation so on normal conditions this program will return any value specified there.
See also:
telescope.c leave(int sig)
